parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Erroneous Activation of Forward Collision Mitigation System
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The system's false activation can cause sudden and unexpected braking, leading to a loss of control, accidents, and potential injuries or fatalities.
symptoms: The vehicle's forward collision mitigation system activates unnecessarily
causing the brakes to engage suddenly
often without warning
and sometimes accompanied by a loud alarm or flashing lights. This can occur when driving on straight roads
curves
or when approaching intersections
and may be triggered by oncoming traffic
road signs
or other environmental factors.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of dealerships and manufacturers to address these issues can lead to continued risk of accidents and injuries, as well as frustration and mistrust among vehicle owners.
symptoms: Dealerships and manufacturers may not take adequate action to address the issue
claiming that the system is functioning as designed or that the problem is due to user error. They may not provide a permanent fix or recall
leaving owners to continue experiencing the problem.

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Unintended Braking and Forward Collision Warning
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The unintended braking and false forward collision warnings can cause sudden stops, leading to rear-end collisions, and potentially resulting in accidents or injuries.
symptoms: The forward collision warning comes on for no reason
brakes are applied unexpectedly
the vehicle nearly comes to a stop
and the CMBS lights remain permanently on.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The audio system malfunction can cause distractions while driving, leading to accidents or near-misses, and can also impact the functionality of other safety features like the backup camera and lane-keeping assist.
symptoms: The speakers or radio crackle and make static noises
music cuts out
and the system becomes unusable.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the auto engine idle restart system can cause the vehicle to stall in traffic, leading to accidents or near-misses, and can also put the driver and passengers at risk.
symptoms: The vehicle fails to restart after coming to a complete stop
requires manual restart
and has been slow to restart many times.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The instrument panel and display failure can cause distractions while driving, leading to accidents or near-misses, and can also impact the driver's ability to access important vehicle information.
symptoms: The entire dash goes blank
speedometer
warnings
and display disappear
and the system takes time to recover.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The transmission and shifter malfunction can cause the vehicle to become stuck in park, leading to accidents or near-misses, and can also cause inconvenience and delay.
symptoms: The vehicle is unable to shift out of park
the push-button electronic shifter is rendered useless
and warning lights for the transmission and blind spot systems appear.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the transmission can cause the vehicle to decelerate or accelerate unexpectedly, leading to loss of control, accidents, or leaving the driver stranded.
symptoms: The vehicle independently decelerates or accelerates
the engine revs
and the RPMs increase
the vehicle fails to respond with the accelerator pedal depressed
the transmission shifts into neutral or low gear on its own
the transmission makes a grinding noise
the dashboard displays a "Transmission Problem" message.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The transmission slipping or harsh shifting can cause the vehicle to lose traction, leading to accidents or loss of control.
symptoms: The transmission slips or harshly shifts
the vehicle accelerates or decelerates unexpectedly
the transmission makes a grinding noise.

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Transmission Error Messages and Failure to Engage Gears
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The transmission error messages and failure to engage gears can cause the vehicle to become stuck in neutral or fail to respond to the accelerator pedal, leading to loss of control or accidents.
symptoms: The dashboard displays a "Transmission Problem" message
the transmission fails to engage gears
the vehicle shifts into neutral or low gear on its own
the vehicle fails to respond with the accelerator pedal depressed.

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Safety Hazard due to Seat Belt Sensor Design
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The seat belt sensor design can cause the vehicle to move forward or backward unexpectedly, creating a serious safety hazard.
symptoms: The vehicle fails to automatically shift into park when the driver exits the vehicle without taking it out of drive
reverse
or neutral
the vehicle moves forward or backward unexpectedly.

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Unintended Braking and Brake System Failure
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The unintended application of the brakes can cause sudden stops, potentially leading to accidents, injuries, or fatalities. Additionally, brake system failures can result in the loss of vehicle control, increasing the risk of crashes.
symptoms: The vehicle suddenly brakes or slows down without warning
the brake pedal feels stiff or hard
the brake pedal does not respond or engage
the vehicle surges forward without warning
the brake warning light illuminates on the dashboard
the steering wheel shakes or vibrates.

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: False Collision Detection and Erroneous Brake Activation
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The false detection of collisions or obstacles can cause the vehicle to brake unnecessarily, leading to sudden stops, accidents, or injuries. This can also lead to a loss of trust in the vehicle's safety features.
symptoms: The vehicle's collision warning system or brake display light activates without an actual obstacle or hazard
the vehicle brakes or slows down unnecessarily
the driver's side mirror warning system activates without an actual obstacle.
